name: react-mapbox
description: A sample on how to interface with mapbox from a React Component.

scripts.build-js-min: npm run build-js; mkdir release; browserify lib/react-mapbox.js -d -t reactify -p [minifyify --map build/react-mapbox.map.json --output build/react-mapbox.map.json] > release/react-mapbox.min.js
scripts.build-sample: mkdir build; browserify index.js -d -t reactify -p [minifyify --map build/index.map.json --output build/index.map.json] > build/index.js

author: Chris Grieger
